page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: Tillingbourne Middle School. There are about 240 children at Tillingbourne School,eight class teachers,and a headmaster. The school stands in 16 acres of land.It has 2 playing fields,a playground and a swimming pool. The subjects which are taught are English,Maths,French,Science,Music, Cooking,Centre of Interest,Craft,P.E. and Games. Each year the school holds a sports day and Summer Fayre.Most of the children in the school take part in the Summer Fayre by helping run stalls or by being in one of the displays. For the sports day all the children are divided into five different colours and score points for their team by taking part in various activities.
